channel.title: Client
channel.description:
hey, im looking for a client to use for my server, what i want it to have is skill capes (all, or most of them, and i want them to look the same as in real runescape, no purple trim or anything)
fighter torsos, defenders maybe, and more stuff would be good.
please post a link if you know any.
and dont spam or flame here.

item.title: Client
item.dc:creator: @deamerdude deamerdude
item.description:
@deamerdude wrote:

http://www.mediafire.com/?htxw3qc0wbl this is icerealm client it has the capes and all defenders, including barrows and dragon ones and alot of custom items u can add to ur server if u want

Read full topic
